meanings.definition: Animals of unmixed ancestry, especially dogs or horses.
meanings.sent1: The dog show featured many purebreds competing for the top prize.
meanings.sent2: She decided to adopt a mixed breed instead of a purebred dog.
meanings.sent3: The purebreds at the farm always looked so regal with their shiny coats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dog breeding, purebreds are like the royalty of the canine kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The purebreds in the competition stood out with their distinct features.

meanings.definition: A person or thing of unmixed descent or origin.
meanings.sent1: The historian traced his lineage back to a line of purebreds from a small village.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her status as a purebred American, with ancestors who came on the Mayflower.
meanings.sent3: The purebreds of the town were known for their unwavering loyalty to tradition.
meanings.sent4: In a world of diverse influences, she stood out as a purebred in her beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The purebreds of the ancient tribe were revered for their unwavering commitment to their heritage.
